ConsoleCommand.Title: SetFontSize
ConsoleCommand.Description: Sets the font size, must be between 10 and 20 (inclusive)

ConsoleCommand.Title: CameraPos
ConsoleCommand.Description: Changes the camera position to the one provided

ConsoleCommand.Title: SetCharacterHealth
ConsoleCommand.Description: Sets the character's health to the value provided

ConsoleCommand.Title: DamageCharacter
ConsoleCommand.Description: Damages the character by the amount provided

ConsoleCommand.Title: CharacterHealthSystemSet
ConsoleCommand.Parameters: String name, Single hp, Boolean overheal, Boolean healable, Boolean invincible, Boolean revivable

ConsoleCommand.Title: AddCurrency
ConsoleCommand.Description: Adds the specified amount of currency

ConsoleCommand.Title: AddCurrency
ConsoleCommand.Description: Adds the specified amount of currency

ConsoleCommand.Title: ConsumeInventory
ConsoleCommand.Description: Consumes the inventory at the position

ConsoleCommand.Title: PlaceInventory
ConsoleCommand.Description: Places an inventory item at the position provided
ConsoleCommand.Parameters: UnityEngine.Vector3 pos, String type, UnityEngine.Vector2 stackSizeRange

ConsoleCommand.Title: PlaceInventoryAtCharacter
ConsoleCommand.Parameters: String characterName, Int32 amount, String type, UnityEngine.Vector2 stackSizeRange

ConsoleCommand.Title: RemoveInventory
ConsoleCommand.Parameters: string type, Int32 amount, Boolean onlyFromStockpiles

ConsoleCommand.Title: PlaceFurniture
ConsoleCommand.Parameters: string type, UnityEngine.Vector3 pos, Single rotation

ConsoleCommand.Title: IsPlacementValid
ConsoleCommand.Parameters: string type, UnityEngine.Vector3 pos, Single rotation

ConsoleCommand.Title: GetTemperature
ConsoleCommand.Description: Gets the temperature at the position

ConsoleCommand.Title: GetThermalDiffusivity
ConsoleCommand.Description: Gets the thermal diffusivity at the position

ConsoleCommand.Title: FloodFillRoom
ConsoleCommand.Description: Floods fills the room at the position provided

ConsoleCommand.Title: DevMode
ConsoleCommand.Description: Floods fills the room at the position provided

ConsoleCommand.Title: NewCharacter
ConsoleCommand.Description: Creates a new character at the position provided

ConsoleCommand.Title: DoBuild
ConsoleCommand.Parameters: Int32 buildMode, string type, UnityEngine.Vector3 pos

ConsoleCommand.Title: SetRoomGas
ConsoleCommand.Description: Sets the gas in the room
ConsoleCommand.Parameters: Int32 roomID, string gasName, Single pressure

ConsoleCommand.Title: SetAllRoomGas
ConsoleCommand.Description: Sets the gas in all rooms

ConsoleCommand.Title: FillRoomWithAir
ConsoleCommand.Description: Set's the room's gasses to standard atmosphere (20/80 O2/N2 mix)

ConsoleCommand.Title: FillAllRoomsWithAir
ConsoleCommand.Description: Set's all rooms' gasses to standard atmosphere (20/80 O2/N2 mix)"
